title: Please help me i have one of the biggest bugs ever!
body: Randomly in game i will not be able to recall, open shop, upgrade abilities, stop auto attacking things until theyre dead, my abilities will be put on quick cast, i have no border of what im aiming at and when i right click the ground it turns red not green. Please help me asap as this stops me from playing. :'(

replies.body:
I'm also having this problem on a mac, it seems to me that it is shift as it seems to occur when I press shift+enter to talk in All chat, haven't tested this, but it has happened about 3/4 games so far. 

What I seemed to notice is that:
- Right clicks turn red
- Unable to buy in the shop, probably linked to the red right click
- Can't press p for the shop
- Can't level up skills

If anyone knows how to fix this it would be much appreciated :/

your Shift key is broken or you have sticky keys turned on. 
Next time it happens try pressing shift once and if that doesn't solve the issue you need to test your shift key.
Omfg i thankyou kindsir so much!! It was my shift key and now all i have to do is double tap shift and it works (which is still annoying) but thankyou
This could be a possible error but since im on a mac there is no sticky key thing
In the mac setting the sticky key function is turned off for me.
This doesn't seem likely at all. Suggesting a reinstall as the first thing to do is bad practice. Not everyone has unlimited internet and such.
I have unlimited internet and i know its not my internet, it happens randomly and i have to restart my client everytime and then later in the game it usually comes back again
I am on a mac so it doesnt help much either
Try turning off all of you accessibility options in your control panel.
